00019    /* 
00020    * Constructor.
00021    */
00022    HarmonicBond::HarmonicBond()
00023     : nBondType_(0)
00024    {
00025       for (int i = 0; i < MaxNBondType; ++i) {
00026          kappa_[i]  =  0.0;
00027          length_[i] =  0.0;
00028       }
00029    }
00030 
00031    /* 
00032    * Copy constructor.
00033    */
00034    HarmonicBond::HarmonicBond(const HarmonicBond& other)
00035     : nBondType_(other.nBondType_)
00036    {
00037       for (int i = 0; i < nBondType_; ++i) {
00038          kappa_[i]  =  other.kappa_[i];
00039          length_[i] =  other.length_[i];
00040       }
00041    }
00042 
00043    /* 
00044    * Assignment.
00045    */
00046    HarmonicBond& HarmonicBond::operator = (const HarmonicBond& other)
00047    {
00048       nBondType_   = other.nBondType_;
00049       for (int i = 0; i < nBondType_; ++i) {
00050          kappa_[i]  = other.kappa_[i];
00051          length_[i] = other.length_[i];
00052       }
00053       return *this;
00054    }

00056    /* 
00057    * Set the nBondType_ member
00058    */
00059    void HarmonicBond::setNBondType(int nBondType)
00060    {  
00061       if (nBondType > MaxNBondType) {
00062          UTIL_THROW("nBondType > HarmonicBond::MaxNBondType");
00063       }
00064       nBondType_ = nBondType;
00065    }

00067    /* 
00068    * Read bond interaction parameters kappa and length from file
00069    */
00070    void HarmonicBond::readParam(std::istream &in) 
00071    {
00072 
00073       // Preconditions
00074       if (nBondType_ <= 0) {
00075          UTIL_THROW("nBondType must be set before readParam");
00076       }
00077 
00078       // Read parameters
00079       readCArray<double>(in, "kappa",  kappa_,  nBondType_);
00080       readCArray<double>(in, "length", length_, nBondType_);
00081    }
00082    
00083    /* 
00084    * Generate a random bond length chosen from an equilibrium distribution for
00085    * randomly oriented bonds. 
00086    *
00087    * The desired probability distribution is proportional to x*x*G(x) for x > 0,
00088    * where G(x) is a Gaussian distribution with a mean x0=length_[type] and a 
00089    * standard deviation sd = sqrt(temperature/kappa_[type]).
00090    *
00091    * Algorithm:
00092    *   - Generate trial bond length x from the Gaussian distribution G(x).
00093    *   - If x < 0, generate another trial bond length.
00094    *   - Let y = x*x/xm*xm, where xm = x0 + 7.0*sd is a maximum length.
00095    *     The algorithm is correct only for y < 1, or x < xm. The distribution
00096    *     G(y) for generated values of y is proportional to G(x)/x.
00097    *   - Accept y if it is greater than a uniform random number in [0,1]. 
00098    *     For y < 1, or x < xm, the probability of accepting y is equal to y. 
00099    *     The distribution A(y) of accepted values of y for y < 1 is thus 
00100    *     proportional to y*G(y), or to x*G(x).
00101    *   - If y is accepted, return x. The distribution A(x) for accepted 
00102    *     values of x is proportional to x*x*G(x) for x < xm.
00103    *
00104    * Limitations:
00105    *     The distribution is correct only for x < xm. The probability of
00106    *     generating a value x >= xm is, however, less than exp(-49/2).
00107    */
00108    double HarmonicBond::randomBondLength(
00109                          Random *random, double beta, int type) const
00110    {
00111    
00112       double sd  = 1.0/sqrt( beta*kappa_[type] );
00113       double x0  = length_[type];
00114       double xm2 = length_[type] + 7.0*sd;
00115              xm2 = xm2*xm2;
00116       double x;
00117    
00118       // Generate trials until one is accepted
00119       for (;;) { 
00120          x = x0 + sd*random->gaussian();
00121          if (x < 0) continue;
00122          if ( x*x/xm2 >= random->uniform(0.0,1.0) ) {
00123             return x;
00124          };
00125       }
00126    }
00127 
00128    /*
00129    * Modify a parameter, identified by a string.
00130    */
00131    void HarmonicBond::set(std::string name, int type, double value)
00132    {
00133       if (name == "kappa") {
00134          kappa_[type] = value;
00135       } else
00136       if (name == "length") {
00137          length_[type] = value;
00138       } else {
00139          UTIL_THROW("Unrecognized parameter name");
00140       }
00141    }
00142 
00143    /*
00144    * Get a parameter value, identified by a string.
00145    */
00146    double HarmonicBond::get(std::string name, int type) const
00147    {
00148       double value;
00149       if (name == "kappa") {
00150          value = kappa_[type];
00151       } else
00152       if (name == "length") {
00153          value = length_[type];
00154       } else {
00155          UTIL_THROW("Unrecognized parameter name");
00156       }
00157       return value;
00158    }

00163    std::string HarmonicBond::className() const
00164    {  return std::string("HarmonicBond"); }
